quotes.quote: Every diamond has the ability to shine when there is someone to recognize its good facets and inhibit its flaws.
Diamonds are intrinsically worthless, except for the deep psychological need they fill.
Diamonds are to be found only in the darkness of the earth, and truth in the darkness of the mind.
The more the diamond is cut the brighter it sparkles; and in what seems hard dealing, there God has no end in view but to perfect His people.
Invest in the human soul. Who knows, it might be a diamond in the rough.
Rough diamonds may sometimes be mistaken for worthless pebbles.
He sparked on his body that reflect like mini mirrors of diamond
Diamonds are a girl's best friend.
Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.
A diamond doesn't start out polished and shining. It once was nothing special, but with enough pressure and time, becomes spectacular. I'm that diamond.
The soul is placed in the body like a rough diamond, and must be polished, or the luster of it will never appear.
Diamonds are nothing more than chunks of coal that stuck to their jobs.
My teachers treated me as a diamond in the rough, someone who needed smoothing.
A diamond, which is the hardest of stones, not yielding unto steel, emery or any other thing, is yet made soft by the blood of a goat.
Adversity is the diamond dust Heaven polishes its jewels with.
Diamonds are the tears of the poor.
All is beautiful and unceasing, all is music and reason , and all, like diamond, is carbon first, then light .
A diamond is just a lump of coal that stuck to its job.
The diamond which shines in the Saviour's crown shall burn in unquenched beauty at last on the forehead of every human soul.
This diamond has so many carats it's almost a turnip.
The fire of the diamond of true Identity is always there; it just needs the Master's crafting to reveal it.
The diamond has been always esteemed the rarest stone, and the most precious of all: among the ancients it was called the stone of reconciliation.
Diamonds are forever, my youth is not.
The more you get past pain, the more it goes from coal to diamond.
Diamond being the toughest thing on the face of earth is still the most prettiest object; pretty is not always being honeyed.
I'm fascinated by diamonds. When I put diamonds on, my hands start to shake.
Through darkness diamonds spread their richest light.
A diamond, though set in horns, is still a diamond, and sparkles in purest gold.
Whether we fall by ambition, blood, or lust, like diamonds we are cut with our own dust.
Some people value sentiments over diamonds.
A diamond was laying in the street covered with dirt. Many fools passed by. Someone who knew diamonds picked it up.
Big girls need big diamonds.
Diamonds never leave you... men do!
I never hated a man enough to give him diamonds back.
Let us not be too particular; it is better to have old secondhand diamonds than none at all.
The diamond is the hardest stone to get.
Diamonds are hard not brittle guard against bitterness.
Diamonds have an image of purity and light. They are given as a pledge of love and worn as a symbol of commitment.
You were never born with a silver spoon in your mouth. Don't think that way. You were born with a diamond spoon in your palm. Carry it by your own hand. Now, feed yourself.
Allow God to use the difficulties and disappointments in life as polish to transform your faith into a glistening diamond that takes in and reflects His love.
A diamond, is a woman's last resort to love.
Perhaps I should just bury myself and become a diamond after thousands of years of intense pressure.

A diamond’s creation requires immense pressure and intense temperatures to reach its highest potential. Without enduring the adversity and pressure of its environment, the diamond would never become the treasure it was meant to be.
You’ll finally realize the importance of the spark of that diamond once you lost it.
People who bury their hopes and crave for someone’s success never know that their diamond is hidden as they envy other’s silver!
Diamond is the hardest substance, but the Irony, it is also brittle.
There are two kinds of diamonds in this world: The diamond itself and the eyes full of love!
When we have graciously endured every adversity, we become like a shining diamond.
The heart of woman is like a diamond, who need a good skilled hunter.
I see a diamond that someone try to turn back into coal.
Just because it looks and shines like a diamond, doesn't necessarily make it one.
Perhaps time’s definition of coal is the diamond.
There comes a moment when the silence between two people can have the purity of a diamond.
What did a diamond bring you? A momentary flash of brilliance. A diamond scintillated for second; a book could scintillate forever.
There are only diamonds in the whole world, diamonds and perhaps the shabby gift of disillusion.
Remember diamonds are created under pressure so hold on, it will be your time to shine soon.
No one knows how precious you are. You are a diamond in the rough and with a little polishing, you will shine.
Life tries to crush her, but only succeeded in making a diamond.
A diamond’s luster is dull before revealing brilliant magnificent breathtaking shine.
Your rebel soul shines like a diamond pulled from dust: bright, clear and flawless.
Life tried to crush her, but only succeeded in creating a diamond.
Time makes the carbon a diamond.
The diamond cannot love the flower, for the flower lives only a day, then fades and dies. You are a diamond now.
You are as like a diamond, unbreakable if it is breakable, and broken in any way, remains still the diamond.
To say the diamond of others like the stone, and own stone like the diamond is the easiest task, but to prove that, is hard.
Wherever diamond exists, it carries, its worth and value with it; similarly, a visionary-figure also stays as like as that.
As only diamond can cut diamond; similarly, the liar's lies can ineffective only by lies, keeping in the mind that proverb: Tit for Tat.
Diamond is but frozen time.
Interns are like not-cut diamonds.
Its hard to be a diamond in a rhinestone world.
Diamonds cut diamonds; they who will prove. To thrive in cunning, must cure love with love.
Diamonds only can cut diamonds; and no such comments on Scripture as the Scripture.
Diamonds are the hardest natural substance known to humanity.
Diamonds can be imitated but not duplicated.
The brilliant sparkle of the diamond ring wooed the whim of a charming your thing.
